title: Dell security advisory (AV25-657)
description: Between October 6 and 12, 2025, Dell published a security advisory to address a vulnerability in the following products:
products: SupportAssist for Home PCs  version prior to 4.8.2.29006
SupportAssist for Business PCs  version prior to 4.5.3.25254
solution: Review the references and apply the necessary updates.
